XXLChess

类 Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXLChess.Piece
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    直接已知子类:
    Bishop, Camel, Chancellor, General, King, Knight, Pawn, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The abstract `Piece` class represents a chess piece. It provides common properties and methods for different types of chess pieces.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Piece

        public Piece(int x,
             int y,
             double value,
             int isPlayer,
             boolean isWhite,
             Tile tile)
        Constructs a `Piece` object with the specified coordinates, value, player, color, and initial tile.
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the piece on the chessboard.
        y - The y-coordinate of the piece on the chessboard.
        value - The value of the piece.
        isPlayer - An integer indicating the player to which the piece belongs (1 for player, -1 for enemy).
        isWhite - A boolean indicating whether the piece is white or black.
        tile - The initial tile occupied by the piece.

    • 方法详细资料

      • clone

        public Piece clone()
        Clones the current `Piece` object.
        覆盖:
        clone 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        A new instance of the cloned `Piece` object.

      • setImage

        public abstract void setImage(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Sets the image of the piece.
        参数:
        app - The PApplet object for rendering.

      • targetTile

        public abstract void targetTile(Board board)
        Determines the valid target tiles for the piece based on its movement rules. Adds the valid tiles to the `lsTile` ArrayList.
        参数:
        board - The chessboard containing the tiles.

      • topBottom

        public void topBottom(Board board)
        See rook class
        参数:
        board - the Board object

        See bishop class
        参数:

      • Pin

        public void Pin(Board board)
        Checks if the piece is pinned on the board. A piece is considered pinned if it cannot move without leaving its own king under attack.
        参数:
        board - The board on which the piece is placed.

      • checkPin

        public void checkPin(Board board)
        Moves the piece to the specified target tile on the board. Simulate all possible moves of this chess piece on the current board. Check if the king will be checked if this piece go to these tiles. If all the places he goes will make the current king check, then the piece is pinned.
        参数:
        board - The board on which the piece is placed.

      • tick

        public void tick(Tile targetTile,
                 Board board)
        Moves the piece to the specified target tile on the board. The x value and y value will be updated according to the speed of piece
        参数:
        targetTile - The target tile where the piece should be moved.
        board - The board on which the piece is placed.

      • check

        public void check(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Checks and handles the graphical representation of the piece on the board. Draw the histroyTiles of piece Draw the lsTiles and captureTiles of Piece if it is pressed
        参数:
        app - The PApplet object for rendering the graphics.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the graphical representation of the piece on the board.
        参数:
        app - The PApplet object for rendering the graphics.

        返回:

      • die

        public void die(boolean isAlive)
        Marks the piece as dead.
        参数:
        isAlive - The status of the piece (alive or dead).

      • getIsAlive

        public boolean getIsAlive()
        Checks if the piece is alive.
        返回:
        True if the piece is alive, false otherwise.

      • press

        public void press()
        Presses the piece. Sets the isPressed flag to true.

      • unpress

        public void unpress()
        Unpresses the piece. Sets the isPressed flag to false.

      • getPress

        public boolean getPress()
        Checks if the piece is pressed.
        返回:
        True if the piece is pressed, false otherwise.
